name: Missile Dodge
description:
The main objectiove of the game is to survive 7 waves of deadly missiles. Once you have survived 7 waves, you will have beaten the game. The player will look and go towards the mouse.  Headphones Recommended.

You will have 3 lives. After losing 1 life, you will gain +10 speed.

This project is open source and under the MIT License. This is the github repository - https://github.com/Arnav-Ghatti/Godot-Wild-Jam-32/

You can contact me on Facebook(https://www.facebook.com/arnav.ghatti.3/), Github(https://github.com/Arnav-Ghatti/), and Itch.io.

Finally, If you like the game, be sure to comment down below. Thank You for Playing my game
